CustomField.description: Indicate that the address validated by Melissa Data's service, reviewed by a Manager, or imported from the WCMS system (marked as "Verified"); "In Approval" denotes awaiting manager approval. "Pending" is while MelissaData is initializing record
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicate that the address validated by Melissa Data's service, reviewed by a Manager, or imported from the WCMS system (marked as "Verified"); "In Approval" denotes awaiting manager approval. "Pending" is while MelissaData is initializing record
CustomField.label: Address Verification Status
